alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Florence, southwestern Dillon, west central Horry, Marion and northwestern Williamsburg Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms extending from near Blue Brick to near Lake City drifting south. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Lake City, Kingstree, Pamplico, Sellers, Galivants Ferry, Blue Brick, Hyman, Hannah, Cades, Gapway, Rains, Gresham, Hebron, Friendfield, Claussen, New Hope, Evergreen, Kingsburg and Scranton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dillon; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
